/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is a two-lane road, divided by a median. On either side of the road, there are trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
